# activationPolicy()

**Instance Method**

Returns the app’s activation policy.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func activationPolicy() -> NSApplication.ActivationPolicy
```

## Return Value

The app’s current activation policy.

## Configuring the activation policy

- **setActivationPolicy(_:)**: Attempts to modify the app’s activation policy.
- **NSApplication.ActivationPolicy**: Activation policies (used by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSRunningApplication/activationPolicy]) that control whether and how an app may be activated.
